rows.label: qst660202_msg0001
rows.name: I am a wandering bard, mo.

rows.label: qst660202_msg0002
rows.name:
I'd like to hear of your
adventures, mo. I'll put them
to song on this Whispercorder, mo.

rows.label: qst660202_msg0003
rows.name:
Of course, I'll give you
something in return, mo!

rows.label: qst660202_msg0102
rows.name:
But wait, I can't sing while
playing the Whispercorder, mo!?

rows.label: qst660202_msg0201
rows.name:
Did you not like my offer,
mo? Or do you not have enough
experience to tell, mo?

rows.label: qst660202_msg0202
rows.name:
In any case, please
talk to me again, mo.
